info.game_comments:
1998 Teen Reunion Tournament preliminary game 1.
From the Wang Center for the Performing Arts in Boston, Massachusetts.

(1, 1).clue: La Nina is the name given to the weather pattern that produces many effects opposite to this one

(2, 1).clue: Leo Gerstenzang thought up this product when he saw his wife twirl cotton on a toothpick & use it as a swab

(4, 1).clue: He plays Jack, who runs things at the Gate magazine, on "Suddenly Susan"
